programme.title: Paula & Pals

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

programme.title: HSBC Women's World Championships
programme.desc: (Live) Boasting one of the strongest fields in women's golf outside of the five Major Championships, the HSBC Women's World Championship will see the top LPGA players battle it out on The Tanjong at Sentosa Golf Club. This year marks the 16th edition of the tournament.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America
programme.desc: Simon travels from the jungles of Guyana to the frozen wastes of Tierra del Fuego, exploring one of the most mysterious and extreme continents on earth. He meets indigenous people in Bolivia and Brazil, taking in both cities and deserts along the way. From Rio de Janeiro, to La Paz, to the epic wilderness of Patagonia, Simon enjoys the epic contrasts of this colourful continent.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: This landmark six-part documentary series charts the planet's most spectacular events of migration, rebirth and transformation. Over the course of a turbulent year, we witness how finely tuned creatures face the Earth's seasonal patterns. However, in the 21st Century these patterns are becoming more extreme, less predictable and dangerously unreliable. From Asia to Europe, Africa, Australia, North and South America - we witness the drama & the spectacle.

programme.title: The Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: The daily adventures of penguins living in New York's Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: The Adventures Of The Young Marco Polo - Journey To Madagascar
programme.desc: Marco Polo is about to return home to Venice when he discovers that his friend Shi La is not an orphan! To find her long-lost mother, Marco, Shi La, and Luigi set out on an adventurous journey across new countries!

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin

programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: On 'Different Day', the teddies have fun dressing up and acting like someone else for the day. Dom pretends to be Sparky, Tizzy pretends to be Dom, Sparky pretends to be Meeks and Meeks pretends to be Tizzy. Later, when Tizzy discovers that they've run out of teddy treats, she gets the idea to make her very own red panda treats. However, her friends are a little skeptical about how the treats will taste when they learn that she's making them with vegetables.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas and his loc-amigos will embrace unexpected surprises and discover more about each other as they get into new shenanigans on the Island of Sodor. Whiff, Ashima, Toby, Terence, Salty and all new characters will join the fun.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: The gang meet an oyster. The Imp steals its pearl. Ollie and Cherry have to set aside their strong opinions, and compromise to save the pearl. Ollie wins first prize at an art competition, and the fame is getting to his head and he leaves his friends to do all the work in creating a specially commissioned piece for the museum.

programme.title: Saving Me
programme.desc: A super genius billionaire goes back in time to teach his 11-year-old self to be a better person.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: The Penguins Of Madagascar

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Madcap, Porcupunk and Orangutank dress up and come knocking on Axel's door, determined to play an evil prank on him! But nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Transformers Earthspark
programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: 100 Wishes
programme.desc: A fresh twist on the Genie lore, 100 Wishes is a heartwarming comedy series in the style of LILO & STITCH and MONSTERS INC.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Food Feud
programme.desc: Which is the Michelin-starred pork noodle stall: Tai Hwa or Tai Wah? Confused customers accidentally end up at the wrong stall prompting the owner of the starred stall to take action.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Cheese is an ingredient in many dishes we eat these days. But do you know what's in your cheese? Steven Chia makes a startling discovery about some of our favourite types of cheese.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Bhaskar finally had enough of Meera and tells her he wants a separation. Chris thinks he is in line to take over at Life Feed but ends up getting a rude shock. Ben's embarrassing accident at TCH gets caught on video and it goes viral.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: Protects your mattress from dust mites and bed bugs with this Ultimate Bed Cover Mattress!

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep.

programme.title: Macao Gourmet
programme.desc: Justine meets with Chef Hans Lee Rasmussen who visited Justine to visit Macao Tourism Institute where he is training aspiring Chefs to fight food waste and make their industry more sustainable.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Lingo UK
programme.desc: In this game show, hosted by the iconic RuPaul, the simplest of words could be worth thousands of dollars. Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: The Chase USA
programme.desc: Contestants compete against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize. Hosted by Sara Haines.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Nelly is upset with Heng when he makes plans to go for another business trip. Evelyn tries to strike a balance between being a friend and a parent to Sarah.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: The police question the hawkers over the vandalism at Sha Sha Cha, and a prime suspect emerges. Meanwhile, an old gangster returns to haunt 128 Circle...

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing
programme.desc: Maggie returns to Boston prepared to deal with the consequences of her professional actions. But a secret is revealed that causes her to question her life in the city. Returning to Sullivan's Crossing, Maggie is forced to face feelings of disappointment and rejection that ultimately lead her to confront Sully about her painful past and make a difficult choice.

programme.title: World Sailing Show
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: The In-Laws
programme.desc: (R) Xiangqin visits the family and Baozhu tries to get into her good books after seeing how deferential Baozhu is to Xiangqin. Xiangqin wants Baozhu to slowly teach Qiuhua and at the same time remind her how important harmony within a family is.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: The Adventurers
programme.desc: (R) Carly, Vick, and the bears have to work together to protect the animals and forest they love. They strive to defend justice, protect their friends, and keep Pine Tree Mountain safe from Wolfgang and Rex Vector!

programme.title: New Doraemon
programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems.

programme.title: Hello Hooman
programme.desc: After reversing a body swap between himself and Tao Tao's pet dog, Kevin soon realises the change is incomplete when his friends start to point out his strange, dog-like behaviour. Kevin falls ill after overexerting his dog-like abilities. Can Tao Tao help his best friend, Kevin and his dog, Pi Pi?

programme.title: Pet Hotel
programme.desc: Featuring tales of the Pet Hotel crew and their special customers the series is a unique and innovative cartoon comedy appealing to children and grownups alike.

programme.title: Tuesday Report : On The Road
programme.desc: (R) Although Luo Lingling has a small frame, she is a heavy motorcycle enthusiast. After her husband failed to convince Lingling to quit her big bike love, he now accompanies his wife whenever she rides. Andy Tan is a private hire vehicle driver. He also runs a pub where clients play darts. Running a mala-pot stall is his other endeavour that he happily undertakes each day.

programme.title: Communion
programme.desc: (R) Jiaqian's customer's online security faces problem and all employees hop on to find the loopholes. Ruotong can't help as she is unfamiliar with coding so she copies the codes and asks Zhang Lai and Jiajian to help to debug it. Inspired by Yaozu's words, Jiajian creates the metaverse based Yuedeju platform. The response is overwhelming and attracts many young people to patronize Yuedeju...

programme.title: Communion
programme.desc: (R) Zhihe applies for a court injunction to stop Yaozu from using the name "Yuedeju" but Yaozu refuses to budge. The review of the Help App drops to one star and Jiajian's team is doomed to lose. Yaozu relates his own experience to encourage Jiajian not to give up. Zhang Lai sends a photo of her with Ruotong to Jiajian, after which her dark history goes viral. When she goes to look for Jiajian, the police from the Internet Crime Division show up and arrest her.

programme.title: Healthy-licious
programme.desc: (R) Get the skills and knowledge to make nutritious ingredients taste good and delicious food nutritious by taking pointers from nutritionists, chefs & other experts.

programme.title: Heart Warmers
programme.desc: (R) By repurposing wedding gowns into angel gowns for angel babies, a group of mothers bring comfort to bereaved parents, providing them moral support through the long difficult journey of losing a child. Faced with an unplanned pregnancy rejected by everyone, what choice does a woman have? A lot, according to Safe Place, an organisation which wants to empower women facing a pregnancy crisis.

programme.title: Live Your Dreams
programme.desc: (R) Wei Cheng helps Si Tong to relieve her stress. Si Tong asks Wei Cheng why he is treating her so well and Wei Cheng tells her that she resembles his daughter. In fact, Si Tong is indeed Wei Cheng's biological daughter. Wei Cheng identified Si Tong when he saw her birthmark, at the anniversary celebration where she played the role of a mermaid. To fulfill Si Tong's dream, Wei Cheng decides to launch a girl group training class.

programme.title: Live Your Dreams
programme.desc: (R) Group B trainees' drink is drug by laxatives, therefore Si Tong improvises and finish the performance with a close call, although they still lost. Breena admits that it was her act, resulting in her disqualification in the competition. Yi An accidentally sees Breena sending a message to Hui Ting and realises that it was Hui Ting who drugged the drinks. Yi An is utterly disappointed by Hui Ting and proposes for a break-up.

programme.title: Singapore Today
programme.desc: (Live) Daily updates on local news headlines and stories.

programme.title: 100% Wife
programme.desc: Xinru and BoBo bring Wanfei's secretary in front of Kunyi and Yingtai, proving that Wanfei forged the diamond ring and set up a scheme to harm Kunyi.

programme.title: 100% Wife
programme.desc: Yongquan and Xinru return with the recovering ring from the search team, to convince Zhilin to give up hope. Zhilin, in disbelief over Yanjun's death, breaks down in tears.

programme.title: Budget Forum
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of high inflation and weaker economic growth, the 2024 Budget includes measures to help Singaporeans and businesses cope with rising costs. Under the theme "Building Our Shared Future Together", it also unveils initiatives aimed to lay a stronger foundation for Singapore's future. Join Deputy Prime Minister Lawerence Wong and his guests as they discuss the 2024 budget.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Getting Real About Trust
programme.desc: Singapore is known to be a high-trust country, but there is an unsettling trend brewing among the youth. Amidst uncertain times, how do they chart their way forward with trust?

programme.title: Frontline
programme.desc: (R) How do advancements in assistive technology help people with physical disabilities to work and pursue their dreams? How can we create a more inclusive society by normalizing assistive technology and integrating them into the community?

programme.title: The Golden Path
programme.desc: (R) The story begins in the early 80s...Xiao Gu, a young widow with three children set up a street stall named "Happy Restaurant" to earn a living. She meets a new love, Ah Jin, but he is exposed as a robber on their wedding day and is shot by the police. On his deathbed, he pleads with Xiao Gu to take care of his two children, Jinlong and Jinfeng. With her optimism towards life, Xiao Gu readily takes on the challenge of raising five young children.

If you're curious why he needs so many bikes, then join Alberto in Yangon who's helping to deliver the bikes to their ultimate owners...

He finds out Huiyao gambled his money away instead of lending it to her brother. Only Biran helps him when loan sharks come after him. At an event, everyone tries to set Biran up with Meiqi. Meiqi goes to St John's Island. Biran goes after her. They start dating.

programme.desc: (Live) A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: (R) Shixiang hints that Tianqing is not up to the task and forcefully volunteers to rebuild the house. Nan Lan has long seen through Shixiang's ambitions, deliberately sending Shixiang out to deal with Xueqiao.

programme.title: Inside OT
programme.desc: (R) Two elderly patients go under the knife at the National Heart Centre Singapore. One man gets an artificial aortic valve implant in a minimally invasive surgery, while the other has to undergo two surgeries; the first to remove a lung nodule and then another to remove a larger part of his lungs.

programme.title: Taste Of Life
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change...

Shugen lived in the old building with the second daughter Xiong Ruoshui, the youngest daughter Xiong Xinru and Shangshan's son Jin Chengan.

programme.title: The Blue Whisper I
programme.desc: (R) Ji Yun He, a powerful and talented spiritual master living in the Thousand Flower Valley, unexpectedly falls in love with a merman named Chang Yi. After overcoming a series of conspiracies and misunderstandings, they finally break free of the barriers between their different worlds to be reunited.

programme.title: The Way To Happiness
programme.desc: With their disparities in wealth and social status, the two brothers of the Gao family and their children find their own ways navigating through the ups and downs of life to find their own happiness.

programme.title: Big White Duel 2
programme.desc: (R) Su Yi meets Zhang Ting, but Zhang Ting took a tough attitude and insists that Tang Ming is the leaker. Tang Ming receives news that Jialin is in a car accident. Su Yi rushes to the scene to give first aid to Jialin. She accidentally scratches her arm while climbing down the hill. She is worried that she would be infected.

programme.title: Hello Singapore
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: Shixiang meets Tianqing in the office for a discussion, during which he attempts to violate Tianqing. At a critical moment, Haisheng appears and saves Tianqing.

programme.title: Pasar Malam Stars
programme.desc: Celebrity chefs Dee Chan and Wu Si Han join hands with two quick-witted hosts, Ben Yeo and Cavin Soh, to take on the challenge of being a Pasar Malam Star! What kind of delicious dishes will the four culinary masters sell at the pasar malam?

programme.title: Whatever Will Be, Will Be
programme.desc: Bizhen realises Mingwei is Jian's son after he saves her from a bike. Bizhen is reluctant to invest in Jian's roasted meat stall. Meiqi suspects Hegui is having an affair and spies on him. Bishan accuses Dafu of hogging the winnings when he finds the receipt. Xishi loses her savings in a love scam. Dafu's family falls out over the winnings. Huiyao gambles again and loses everything.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Budget Forum
programme.desc: (R) Against the backdrop of high inflation and weaker economic growth, the 2024 Budget includes measures to help Singaporeans and businesses cope with rising costs. Under the theme "Building Our Shared Future Together", it also unveils initiatives aimed to lay a stronger foundation for Singapore's future. Join Deputy Prime Minister Lawerence Wong and his guests as they discuss the 2024 budget.

programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series'
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Dapur Panas
programme.desc: Dapur Panas led by famous celebrity chef Naem Ramli will meet you every week. Chef Naem Ramli will prepare main dish and desserts with invited guest celebrities. The series has managed to capture the hearts of many viewers.

programme.title: Hilang
programme.desc: HILANG believe stories must be passed on or they die. Therefore, HILANG or aka The Lost Stories Project returns for a second season to engage Singaporeans in the process of commemorating their stories on heritage. This info-edutainment vlogging style program aims to bring together members of the public, artists and social media influencers to explore lost or the disappearing heritage stories about the Singapore past.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: X is an expedition of knowledge where the players' mission to complete the map will be halted by disasters which they have to overcome. The further their journey is, the more money they will earn.

programme.title: Diari Daddy
programme.desc: Talks on celebrity Shuib and his four children after the death of his beloved wife, Siti Sarah who died of Covid.

programme.title: Mana Bro?
programme.desc: In the time when everything is at your fingertips - travelling, commuting, communication - it would be fun to sometimes go back to the basics. Mana Bro is a reality show that put two teams in a challenge to get from Point A to Point B to Point C minus the technologies and gadgets.

programme.title: Ayahanda
programme.desc: Haji Abdullah goes to Aziz's house to explain to Mazni the reason behind Aziz's marriage to Rahayu. To their surprise and disappointment, Haji Abdullah and Aziz discover Mazni has been lying to them.

programme.title: Masih Ada Rindu
programme.desc: Even after his marriage to Nasha, Imran still has Syafika in his heart. Nasha continues to create conflict between Syafika and Hadi.

programme.title: Belanjawan & Anda
programme.desc: Budget & You 2024 (M) / Belanjawan & Anda 2024.

programme.title: Wassup Bro?
programme.desc: Wassup Bro? features Alif Satar as the host of the show who will share his own first hand experience, learning and mastering 13 different types of extreme sports around Malaysia namely motocross, drifting, paragliding, rock climbing, diving and many more. At the end of every episode, Alif will challenge himself to perform a certain challenge before he ends the show.

programme.title: Bunga Hati
programme.desc: Salimah and Dilaila mourns the passing of Luqman. However, this does not stop Jess from carrying out her plan to hurt Dilaila.

programme.title: Cinta Buat Dara

This debut episode, Pornsak is at Health Sciences Authority to learn more about the job of forensic personnel.

programme.title: A Man In A Veil

Soon after, Youluo returns to Shujun's house once again and tells his family that she is pregnant with Shujun's child.

programme.title: Love And Fortune
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Thai) Haotian admits that Yuqin is his wife and his wedding with Ruyin is called off. Cunhong steals Shengwen's pendant and runs into Zhenshan...

programme.title: Young Lady And Gentleman
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Duanduan gives Yingguo time to make up his mind about accepting her as his girlfriend. Yingguo debates his feelings for Duanduan, while Duanduan eagerly awaits his decision.

programme.title: Young Lady And Gentleman
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Siluo finds out that Duanduan is Shoutie's daughter and tells Dailan about it. programme.title: ISTRIKU RATU ARISAN
programme.desc: Novi is the son of a rich man who often holds fictitious social gatherings with large nominal amounts. Novi, who took the initiative to get married because she wanted to get rid of her father's scorn, married a kind-hearted public transportation driver named Aris. However, their marriage was not based on love, Aris felt that Novi married him because he only wanted to be separated from his father.

Living as a child who is fairly difficult from an economic point of view makes him often the target of ridicule from his classmates. Joko is often nicknamed JAB which stands for Joko Anak Babu. Even so, Joko accepted the insults and responded with learning achievements that surpassed his schoolmates.

programme.title: Cewek Perabot Cintanya Ambyar Menembus Awan
programme.desc: Because Alya's (Larasati Nugroho) furnished car broke down on a hill, the car went down and hit Ricky (Rendy Kjaernett) causing him to hit his head and lose his memory. Ricky's family was looking for him half to death, but Alya even gave Ricky a new personality and lived at home with his family. Will Ricky be found by his family and what will happen to his memory?

programme.title: Anak Band
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with her vegetable cart, felt like she got a durian downfall when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who is kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Pasien Aja Disembuhin, Apalagi Kamu
programme.desc: Cia (Rachquel Nesia) blames Rifky (Qausar Harta Yudana) for failing to save her mother. Moreover, Cia's motorbike was taken by her boyfriend Rifky. Finally, Cia changed profession to become a herbal medicine lady.

programme.title: Love Story The Series
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Pecahkan Saja Hati Mika, Biar Ramai
programme.desc: This story is about Mika (Glenca Chysara), a girl who is reckless, strangely impulsive and has a hobby of making crazy decisions, but has a successful career. She is willing to leave everything for the boy (Rendy Jhon) she likes and lives in the village as a volunteer teaching elementary school children. But all her hopes fell apart because what she expected did not match reality, because the boy turned out to be engaged!

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: In a nail-biting climax to the 2011-2012 Premier League season, Manchester City clinched the title with unparalleled drama. Facing Queens Park Rangers on the final matchday, City secured a 3-2 victory with Sergio Aguero's iconic last-minute goal, securing their first league title in 44 years and etching that game into footballing folklore. They have since become the dominant power in English football and we look at how it all began.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: With over a decade of experience playing in the Premier League, John Stones welcomes former Everton teammate Leon Osman to the Manchester City training ground to discuss the finer points of his game. From the risks he took as a young defender, to developing his skills under Pep Guardiola at City, the pair watch footage of Stones defend and dissect how and why his unique characteristics can help his side build from the back.

programme.title: THE WEEKEND WRAP (Live)
programme.desc: The Weekend Wrap features comprehensive match highlights, the best post-match reaction and expert analysis from a high-class team of pundits.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS
programme.desc: Former Premier League striker Andy Cole joins Will Perry in the locker room as he unveils his top 10 Premier League moments.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Chelsea defender, Levi Colwill takes a walk around the club's training ground in Cobham with former Chelsea WSL star, Karen Carney. The 20-year old goes into detail about the art of defending and how he uses his body to position himself on the pitch to help the team. He also shares his thoughts on playing under Roberto De Zerbi whilst on loan at Brighton, coming through the ranks at Chelsea and why wearing the number 26 shirt means so much to him.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Having a family name so prominent in the world of football, Justin Kluivert is keen to escape the trappings of comparison with his famous father and former Barcelona star, Patrick. Having witnessed his friend and former teammate, Abdelhak Nouri suffer a cardiac arrhythmia attack on the pitch whilst at Ajax, Kluivert's outlook on life changed. As a result, the Bournemouth forward's drive and determination to fulfil his ambitions grew stronger as he reveals in this week's Big Interview.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: With a keen eye for goal combined with electric pace, Gabriel Martinelli is helping steer Arsenal towards another title challenge. But the bright lights of the Premier League are a far cry from the hard practise sessions his father made him do on a local court as a youngster. Martinelli sits down with The Big Interview to discuss his upbringing, harnessing his talent at Corinthians, leaving Brazil for Europe and what the future holds for Arsenal under Mikel Arteta.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Having played for 14 different clubs and with a new long-term contract recently secured at Luton Town, Andros Townsend shares his dietary secrets to sustaining a long career in this week's Big Interview. Having felt "embarrassed" at previous club, Everton by not being able to play due to injury, the 32 year-old wasn't sure if he'd play again - before a call from Kenilworth Road meant he could enjoy football once again.

programme.desc: The CONMEBOL Sudamericana, named as Copa Sudamericana , is an annual international club football competition organized by CONMEBOL since 2002. programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 4: Seoul, South Korea - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Hapkido and the Martial Art of Feet, Hands and Throws featuring Masters Kim Nam Je, Bae Sung Book and Ju Soong Weo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Jose Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his NABF welterweight title against Jose Miguel Cotto, Alvarez's final bout before rising through the ranks and championships of the WBC. Also on the card, a heavyweight kickboxing clash between Errol Zimmerman vs. Rico Verhoeven.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Takakeisho, Mitakeumi, Shohozan and Meisei from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at how John Alessio, a MMA veteran of almost 20 years, prepares for an upcoming fight. We head inside the kitchen of one of MMA's leading nutritionists, Mike Dolce, to find out what are the approved foods in the Dolce Diet. Melvin Guillard summons his inner daredevil and jumps off the Stratosphere in Las Vegas, plus much more.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode highlights The Best of Women's MMA from St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Timothy Bradley vs. Devon Alexander
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a battle of unbeaten junior welterweights to unify the WBC and WBO world titles as Timothy Bradley, aka 'Desert Storm', (26-0, 11 KOs) faces Devon Alexander 'The Great' (21-1, 13 KOs). This fight took place at the Silverdome in Pontiac, Michigan, USA on January 29, 2011.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Chad Dawson vs. Antonio Tarver II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Light Heavyweight 'Bad' Chad Dawson (27-0, 17 KOs) vs. Antonio 'Magic Man' Tarver (27-5, 19 KOs). Held at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA on May 9, 2009, it's Dawson's first defense of the IBF Light Heavyweight and IBO Light Heavyweight titles.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Marco Antonio Barrera vs. Agapito Sanchez
programme.desc: With the WBO Super Bantamweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Antonio Barrera of Mexico takes on Dominican challenger Agapito Sanchez in front of a hot crowd at the Civic Center in South Padre Island, Texas. This would be the third defense for Barrera, who claimed the title with a decision victory over Daniel Jimenez earlier in the year. Sanchez was a worthy contender to the title, giving the 37-0 champion a much tougher challenge than he expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Danny Garcia vs. Erik Morales
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Danny Garcia looking to win the WBC super lightweight championship when he squares off with Erik Morales, but Garcia must battle back after suffering a nose injury early on. Also on the card, former world champions Hector Camacho and Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Kotoyuki, Asanoyama, Aoiyama and Ryuden from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Competitors tackle ten obstacles in Baltimore, Maryland, including brand new obstacles like the Rumbling Dice and Body Prop. 30 athletes will have to prove themselves once again in order to earn a trip to Las Vegas. Find out if children's performer Jamie Rahn, also known as Captain NBC, has enough grip strength to get him through the course.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 6'5" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Anass Aaras vs Andre Estevao
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features main event Anass Aaras (Morocco) vs. Andre Estevao (Angola).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Daieisho, Onosho, Abi and Takayasu from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy monster is just about to take a bite out of his delicious green sock for breakfast, but before he can it gets blown away! He goes to OKIDO to find out why the wind is so blowy.

programme.title: Kazoops!
programme.desc: Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.desc: The dog is using his trusty binoculars to do some birdwatching and the squirrels want to have a go too, but Roly finds being very quiet is difficult.

programme.desc: The dog and the squirrels arrange a puppet show to tell the story of a great adventure they had.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: After deciding to play football, Duggee starts the game by kicking the ball to the squirrels - who look at it blankly as they do not know what to do.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to Bird Island in Antarctica to help rescue a grey-headed albatross chick that gets blown off its nest during a storm.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Grace looks at machines that all look like animals! She rides a Seabreacher and a robot hexapod, and the archive feature is an Ornithopter.

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Line is stuck inside a barrel and can't get out. Can anyone help him?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas has to help Whiff take a train of rubbish to the waste dump, but wants to stay clean so that he can take the Duchess of Boxford to have tea with Lady Hatt.

programme.desc: Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck
programme.desc: The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora
programme.desc: On a windy day, Nelly and Nora discover that everything's talking, even the clothesline!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books

programme.title: Kazoops!
programme.desc: Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: See No Evil

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent?

programme.title: WITNESS
programme.desc: Euronews Witness brings world issues into focus through the experiences of people at the heart of the story. Anelise Borges goes beyond the headlines, debates and data analysis… and into people’s lives. Committed to reporting without fear or favor, we will hear from those first affected by an event, investigate wrongdoing, and hold those in power accountable, while actually covering the world.

programme.desc: BIG FOOD explores the business of keeping large amounts of food moving - sometimes 24/7. Through the eyes of staff on the ground of some of Singapore's busiest food empires, we follow the journey of the food all through the supply chain.

programme.title: The Story Of Food
programme.desc: Ever wondered how, over thousands of years, the simple cup of tea came to be the world's most consumed beverage after water? Or how coffee made its way from Ethiopia into Europe and across the world to become the everyday drink we love to consume? And why is it that people the world over have turned to chocolate for rituals, medicine, romance and sheer pleasure for 4,000 million years?

programme.title: Angelo's Outdoor Kitchen
programme.desc: In this series, we follow chef, restaurateur, and cooking personality, Angelo Georgalli as he collects fresh seasonal ingredients from remote locations in New Zealand and uses his rustic portable kitchen to prepare a selection of simple,mouth-watering dishes. Each episode showcases the vivid beauty of New Zealand's coastline and surrounding wilderness.and includes three meals that are easy to prepare and delicious to eat.

programme.title: Exploring Factories (R)
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: Design Ah! neo
programme.desc: Children can learn the enjoyment of designing and the process of envisioning designs.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese
programme.desc: A children's program which focuses on learning correct Japanese by letting children have fun with the words.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let’s learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: This program targets children aged 4 and 5, with an emphasis on education related to health, human relationships, environment, language and expressions to nurture their creativity and assist them in finding happiness through new discoveries.

programme.title: NHK ACADEMIA (R)
programme.desc: This is a lecture program in which top runners in various fields as lecturers speak professionally and uniquely on themes that "must be shared now more than ever". What is the "unshakable intellect" that they have arrived at by overcoming the anxieties and setbacks of their youth? Every month, we invite participants to join us for live online lectures.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: Today's Close-up
programme.desc: The program flexibly probes into a wide range of topics from the NHK’s unique point of view.

programme.title: Quiz! Just Circle It
programme.desc: A new type of quiz show, in which anyone can participate by just circling the answers that can be found in photos and illustrations. You can challenge quizzes through your smartphone or PC. Get together with your friends and family in front of TV and enjoy the show!

programme.title: NHK News 845
programme.desc: Today's latest metropolitan area news and weather information program.

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's mainstay evening news program.

programme.title: The Last Families in Isolated Islands
programme.desc: Japan is consisted of more than 6800 islands. This is a variety program exploring isolated islands where only a few families live in. Looking at local people’s daily lives, it discovers unknown history of the islands and the reasons why they settled down there.

programme.title: Fish Masters 5min (R)
programme.desc: A variety program exploring the mysterious world of fish with the fish expert Sakana-kun.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "The Yuming Stories" Week 1 Eps.1（New）
programme.desc: A series of drama with casts in the spotlight, for the end of your day.

programme.title: Treasured Videos from NHK Archives
programme.desc: NHK unseals and provides treasured video archives back to back. They are unique but full of "natural" human life scene pictures. Enjoy the heritage video clips with laughter and tears!

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: International News Report

programme.title: News Commentary
programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: Documentary: 20 Minutes
programme.desc: A documentary program produced and directed by creators of young generation.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.desc: Chinese-American SWAT team captain Wei Xiao Chen (Chrissie Chau) destroys the base of a human trafficking syndicate, and discovers the body of a woman who turns out to be her twin sister. She is devastated and vows to track down the truth of the murder.

programme.title: A Journey to Love
programme.desc: The story revolves the top assassins from Wu nation and their diversly skilled six-member team embarking on a journey filled with challenges and crises.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Last Immortal
programme.desc: It tells the inspirational story that unfolds between Yin, a diligent Shuining Beast, and Gu Jin, the son of the true God, whose magical powers were sealed. They encountered each other by chance and embarked on a journey to find the Feng Yin Immortal Essence.

programme.title: The Last Immortal
programme.desc: It tells the inspirational story that unfolds between Yin, a diligent Shuining Beast, and Gu Jin, the son of the true God, whose magical powers were sealed. They encountered each other by chance and embarked on a journey to find the Feng Yin Immortal Essence.

programme.title: Flight To You
programme.desc: The story follows an aspiring civil aviation pilot struggling to work with her cold and strict captain due to personality clashes. While experiencing several life-threatening aviation incidents, they learn to work together and grow to value each other.

programme.title: Flight To You
programme.desc: The story follows an aspiring civil aviation pilot struggling to work with her cold and strict captain due to personality clashes. While experiencing several life-threatening aviation incidents, they learn to work together and grow to value each other.

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: The Beauty Of War
programme.desc: Three friends were as close as sisters. However after graduation, they part their ways for various reasons. Later, all three entered the entertainment industry, but jealousy, dignity, and wealth on this 'battlefield' made them even more distanced.

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold

programme.title: Dead Ringer

programme.title: A Journey to Love
programme.desc: The story revolves the top assassins from Wu nation and their diversly skilled six-member team embarking on a journey filled with challenges and crises.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Zhen Xin (Tavia Yeung) and Jia Luoyi (Rain Li) marry into the wealthy Ma family on the same day. The 'century wedding' paves way for the ups and down among the three generations in the Ma family.

programme.title: Super Snoops
programme.desc: Inspector SUN CHIU-TUNG (Liza Wang) leaves the police force because of an unsettled case. She then opens a private investigation agency and, due to all sorts of accidental mishaps, employs KUNG CHAK-LAM (Wong Cho Lam), KUNG TUK-LAM (Louis Yuen) and TSUI SHUI (Johnson Lee). The three young men have all been treated badly by life. By taking them in, TUNG is given the ability of clairvoyance, that is, the power to see the future.

programme.title: Super Snoops
programme.desc: Inspector SUN CHIU-TUNG (Liza Wang) leaves the police force because of an unsettled case. She then opens a private investigation agency and, due to all sorts of accidental mishaps, employs KUNG CHAK-LAM (Wong Cho Lam), KUNG TUK-LAM (Louis Yuen) and TSUI SHUI (Johnson Lee). The three young men have all been treated badly by life. By taking them in, TUNG is given the ability of clairvoyance, that is, the power to see the future.

programme.title: To Get Unstuck In Time
programme.desc: Regional Crime Unit officer KWONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is investigating a serial homicide. The suspect is a past criminal who had escaped from his late father HO (HUI SHIU HUNG) more than twenty years ago. _x000D__x000D_\tKWONG races a detective fiction writer CORAL (CHAN WAI SHAN, FLORA) to find the real killer. He does not have any clue. Suddenly, HO rings his old cell phone to talk to KWONG. Apparently HO died in a very undignified manner. Therefore, KWONG does not tell him their real relationship.

programme.title: To Get Unstuck In Time
programme.desc: Regional Crime Unit officer KWONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is investigating a serial homicide. He does not have any clue. Suddenly, HO rings his old cell phone to talk to KWONG. Apparently HO died in a very undignified manner. Therefore, KWONG does not tell him their real relationship.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.16)
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: When A Dog Loves A Cat
programme.desc: CHOW CHI YU (Wu Myolie) once adopted a stray dog TAI PA but it brought virus to her father’s kennel and all the dogs inside are dead tragically. Since then, her older brother CHOW CHI JIM (Lui Fong) and sister-in-law SHUI TIN LAN (Tsang Wah Sin) have no choice but to open a pet shop for a living. Later, YU met TAI PA’s little brother SIU PA but her boyfriend YING HOI LEUNG (Wong Ho Yin) suggested her to keep it in an empty house nearby.

programme.title: Off the Grid (Sr.2)
programme.desc: Experience an in-depth train tour in Tokyo, Hakone, and Izu, chase the cutest mascots, and develop amazing skin at the Bliss Hot Spring. The travel companions have also been updated. In addition to the familiar Taiwanese charming hosts Mou Yunjie, Su Ziyun, and Liang Kaiqing, they also teamed up with Hong Kong artists to travel collectively, using curious eyes and endless vitality to create the most authentic travel map.

programme.desc: Regional Crime Unit officer KWONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is investigating a serial homicide. He does not have any clue. Suddenly, HO rings his old cell phone to talk to KWONG. Apparently HO died in a very undignified manner.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Family Link, The
programme.desc: Many people say that housewives are good-for-nothing and will only idle away their time on boring chores. But MUNG KA-KA (TANG SHUI MAN, SHEREN), TING MUI-HEUNG (YIP TUNG, CECILIA) and CHO MEI-NGO (SHEUNG TIN NGOR, KIKI) will prove them wrong. Contrary to what you might think, being a housewife is as stressful as fighting in the battlefield. The never-ending housework and the persistent family conflicts will put them on the alert at all times.

programme.title: Beauty And The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Lai-mei (Ali Lee) rejoins the workforce after playing the role of housewife for ten years after her marriage. She is employed by PR agency boss Mak Tsz-fung (Moses Chan). She then decides to get a divorce as she realizes she has misspent her youth on her husband. Tsz-fung, So Chak-kei (Raymond Cho), Tong Yan (Edwin Siu) and Choi See-ki (Harriet Yeung) are amicable partners.

programme.title: Awakening Story, The
programme.desc: LAM HO SHU (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) had fallen into a coma after a traffic accident sixteen years ago. She wakes up suddenly. With support from her husband, KI (LAU CHUNG YAN, DAMIAN), her daughters, KA (CHEUNG HO YEE, MAGGIE) and YAN (YEUNG YI, TAVIA), her son, CHAI (TANG KIN WANG, PATRICK), and best friend, LAM (SO YUK WAH, LOUISA), she takes up the responsibility of being a mother and a wife again. Unfortunately, KI and LAM have already developed a relationship.

programme.title: Speed Of Life
programme.desc: The police inspector of the traffic unit, TO CHEUK-FUNG (Kenny Wong), takes it upon himself to crack down on illegal street racing and bring the criminals to justice, often driving a stealth car to patrol the highways for traffic enforcement along with his subordinates. CHEUK-FUNG appears to be an aloof man with a stern face, and none of his co-workers understand him except SZE MA (Benjamin Yuen) of the accident investigation unit.

programme.title: Speed Of Life
programme.desc: The police inspector of the traffic unit, TO CHEUK-FUNG (Kenny Wong), takes it upon himself to crack down on illegal street racing and bring the criminals to justice, often driving a stealth car to patrol the highways for traffic enforcement along with his subordinates. CHEUK-FUNG appears to be an aloof man with a stern face, and none of his co-workers understand him except SZE MA (Benjamin Yuen) of the accident investigation unit.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony
programme.desc: A widow CHI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY) owns a popular restaurant, Honey Cave, in Resonance Town. She has triplets - two boys, NIN and YUE and a daughter, YAT. NIN used to be working as a government official in the capital, but he has offended a princess and has been demoted and sent back to his hometown.

programme.title: Twinkle, Twinkle Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Jackie Chan rejoins the finale of this comedy trilogy for another action packed adventure. Five Lucky Stars on holiday in Thailand are told to contact an informant there, but he gets killed. They must return to Hong Kong to protect the informant's daughter who holds the evidence. Assisted by two super cops, they team up to hunt down the killers.

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: My Left Eye Sees Ghosts
programme.desc: May inherits a great fortune when her husband dies, but chooses to waste her life away. After going through an eye operation due to an accident, May begins to see ghosts from her left eye, including a bothersome ghost, Wong. The two team up to help other ghosts and become great friends. One day, May implores Wong to help her instead...

programme.title: Black Mask
programme.desc: Martial arts star Jet Li donned a black hat and mask to portray a comic book superhero in this pulp action tale. The genetically-engineered super-soldier finds that his former comrades are planning to take over the drug illegal trade and tries to stop it.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: Police Story II
programme.desc: Ka Kui is demoted despite his arrest of drug baron Chu, so he takes off for a vacation with girlfriend, May. When an explosion occurs, he returns to investigate and tracks it down to the terrorists. As the terrorists kidnap May and adhere explosives on Ka Kui to demand ransom from the police, he vows to save his girl and the day!

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: The Lunatics
programme.desc: This classic Hong Kong movie is about a psychiatrist (Fung Shui Fan) who devotes his time to help the mentally ill people on the streets. Most of them are borderline insane and getting them back from the bottom of the society barrel is tough work. However, he had one successful case. The man has lived alone for one year after being declared healthy. However, this peace soon crumbles after he is denied from seeing his son....

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong's neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Rouge
programme.desc: Fleur is the blue angel in one of Hong Kong's bordellos and night clubs. She falls in love with "12th Master" Chan, the heir to a chain of pharmacies. They agree on a suicide pact and Fleur dies, but Chan is saved. 50 years later, Fleur's ghost appears in a newspaper office wanting to place an ad to find Chan, who never arrives in the afterlife.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Mighty Baby
programme.desc: Lena, Johnny and Wayne are tasked with developing the "Mighty B" line of baby products. Since the last successful launch of the "Mighty Bra", Johnny now heads the department while Lena and Wayne are planning their wedding. Wayne however, has "Baby-Phobia", and that throws a wrench into their work and relationship.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Xiao Zhuang is a professional killer who accidentally blinds a young nightclub singer Jenny in a gunfire action. He must quickly raise a lot of money for Jenny's corneal transplantation but his action draws the attention of a detective who is investigating the case. Will Xiao Zhuang be arrested and can Jenny restore her sight?

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Ling's image consultant.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yang's escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again...

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.
